title: Greenbelt Park: Bridging the Watershed
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Bridging the Watershed                Greenbelt Park Bridging the Watershed      Bridging the Watershed (BTW) is an outreach program of the Alice Ferguson Foundation, in partnership with the National Park Service and area schools, whose purpose is to provide personally meaningful, educational experiences that connect students to their place in the natural and cultural world.Teachers, Bridging the Watershed could be the perfect program for your school or class. Click here for Bridging the Watershed website.
